pullRequest.title: [FLINK-16967][metrics][Slf4j] Refactor Slf4jReporter to be instantiat…
pullRequest.bodyText:
…ed through Slf4jReporterFactory that implements MetricReporterFactory

What is the purpose of the change
Adds a new MetricsReporterFactory implementation to support loading Slf4jReporter through a factory based approach.
Brief change log

Refactor Slf4jReporter to be instantiated through Slf4jReporterFactory that implements MetricReporterFactory

Verifying this change
This change is a trivial rework / code cleanup without any test coverage.
Does this pull request potentially affect one of the following parts:

Dependencies (does it add or upgrade a dependency): (no)
The public API, i.e., is any changed class annotated with @Public(Evolving): (no)
The serializers: (no)
The runtime per-record code paths (performance sensitive): (no)
Anything that affects deployment or recovery: JobManager (and its components), Checkpointing, Kubernetes/Yarn/Mesos, ZooKeeper: (no)
The S3 file system connector: (no)

Documentation

Does this pull request introduce a new feature? (yes)
If yes, how is the feature documented? (JavaDocs)

commit.message: [FLINK-16967][metrics][Slf4j] Refactor Slf4jReporter to be instantiated through Slf4jReporterFactory that implements MetricReporterFactory

nodes.bodyText: This shouldn't be added, as it is an unrelated change.

commit.message: [FLINK-16967][metrics][Slf4j] remove Slf4jReporter annotation @PublicEvolving and set config_key to metrics.reporter.slf4j.factory.class in flink-end-to-end-tests/test/scripts/common.sh#setup_flink_slf4j_metric_reporter

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              add_optional_lib "metrics-slf4j"
          
          
            
              add_optional_plugin "metrics-slf4j"
          
      
    
    
  

This is just a small formality to have the reporter be really loaded as a plugin.

commit.message: [FLINK-16967][metrics][Slf4j] remove Slf4jReporter unused annotation and change add_optional_lib to add_optional_plugin in flink-end-to-end-tests/common.sh#setup_flink_slf4j_metric_reporter
